title: French rail unions try to disrupt Macron's reforms
text:
French rail unions try to disrupt Macron's reforms 10:35am BST - 01:35 
French rail unions began a wave of rolling strikes on Tuesday in a challenge to President Emmanuel Macron's reform agenda.   
French rail unions began a wave of rolling strikes on Tuesday in a challenge to President Emmanuel Macron's reform agenda.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/04/03/french-rail-unions-try-to-disrupt-macron?videoId=414447946&videoChannel=13422
